text: @realDonaldTrump so now you want more Americans to die before this covid-19 starts to level out? wth is wrong w you??. the worst is yet to come..it may be months or a year before all is clear..STOP PLAYING DOCTOR bc you and Jared don't know a freaking thing abt medical and health issues.#moron
